body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting us today. My name is Richard Bennett and I'm from Wheels & Deals, your trusted car dealership. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Richard, my name is Patricia Moore.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Patricia. Could you please provide me with your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, three three two, one zero nine eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Patricia. Lastly, may I have your email address as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is pmoore@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Patricia. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that was all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Patricia. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out to us. Thank you for your time and have a great day!
